content.description:
Pliny at His Country House

Nulla spe, nullo timore sollicitus sum, nullis rumoribusrumor, -is, m: rumor, gossip 
inquietorinquieto, -are: to disturb: mecum tantum et cum libris loquor. O rectamrectus, -a, -um, adj.: proper, correct 
sinceramsincerus, -a, -um, adj.: genuineque vitam! O dulce otium honestumhonestus, -a, -um, adj.: respectable, honestque atque 
paene omni negotio pulchrius!
content.question: At his country house, Pliny the Younger would have spent time away from his career as
